metadata.title: JUNOESQUE Manual Burr Coffee Grinder ACE48 Series Titanium-Coated Carbon Steel Hexagon Conical Burr with Fine Adjustable Selector, Consistency Grinding and Efficient for Espresso, Black
features: ★ GRINDING FAST AND CONSISTENCY - Manual coffee grinder upgrades 1.9in large hexagon conical burr, double bearing with unique spline, horizontal ball design, four layers of fixed central shaft, make the burr stable and not offset, you can get the smoother and faster grinding, finer consistency powder, which brings you more pure flavor of Espresso

★ DIAL IN YOUR PREFERRED GRIND SIZE - built-in adjustable grind Selector with over 18 click settings ensures you have 100% precision control over the coarseness of your Pour-over, Drip, Cold Brew, French press, Especially perfect for Espresso, perfect grind every time

★ HARDER AND MORE DURABLE - The manual burr coffee grinder upgraded a large burr with titanium-coated process. It is hard, sharp, durable, and grinds quickly. You can quickly taste a cup of delicious coffee and it can last for many years

★ PORTABLE TO CARRY-The cover is separated from the crank to prevent the bean from spilling when you take it out. Load your favorite coffee beans and share your refined coffee with your friends anywhere, it's also a good choice for travel and camping

★ QUICK DISASSEMBLY, EASY TO CLEAN - The arc design of the inner bottom of the powder cup makes it easier to clean the powder cup and solves the problem of residual powder embedded in the right angle gap of the ordinary powder cup. The grinder can be quickly disassembled and cleaned with brush. Use the included electric drill bit, you can easily turn your grinder into an electric grinder
description: Manual Burr Coffee Grinder，with titanium-coated Italian high-carbonsteel precision hexagon burr, built-in adjustable grind Selector with over 18 click settings, splinedesign with double bearings to stabilize the central shaft to eliminate burrs swing allows you togrind your favorite thickness precisely and quickly, enables consistently fast grinding every time. This is a professional entry grinder.
THE DNA OF MANUAL COFFEE GRINDER
HRC63, Higher Hardness, Sharper, Faster Grinding ▶
More Consistently Grinding, Less Labor, Both Espresso and Pour-Over ▶

Subtle Adjustment, Smooth Grinding and Prevent Shaking Fine-Tune Grind Selector Clockwise fine grinding, anti-clockwise coarse grinding. With more than 18 click settings, it can beadjusted in 6 turns. Up to 108 click settings giving precision to the coarseness of grind for yourPour Over, Drip, Cold Brew, French Press, Espresso, or your specific brewing method. Separated Handle Cover The cap and crank can be separated, so the hopper becomes a removable storage container, which isconvenient and portable. The crank design, while saving effort, eliminates more than 95% of thenoise produced by the electric mill. Receiver Integral molding, C corner at the bottom, to avoid powder hiding, use a brush to easily remove theresidual powder.
1 * Manual Burr Coffee Grinder  1 * Matching Drill Bit  1 * Portable Bag  1 * Instructions  1 * Non-slip Ring 1 * Brush
●This machine contains sharp parts, pay attention to prevent scraping.  ●Do not let children operate this machine.Product Description
